name: Escape If You Can (Ads Free)
description:
Can You Escape - Holidays - Out Now!

Advance to the next floor by solving the puzzles!

You can pick certain items up and use them from your inventory.

Keep the Escape If You Can app, so we can notify you of new levels.

9 floors available at the moment!

Smartphone puzzles!
Addicting mini puzzles!
Gorgeous graphics and different themed floors!
Constant updates of New Floors!
